phrase.str: That tastes great. Hurry up boy you're a bit slow aren't you?
What's going on! You said this would save her!
I am reborn! The mighty Krazoa God! (laugh)
Kneel all those that stand before me! (laugh)
We will never kneel to you!
Well thanks for nothing! If it wasn't for me you wouldn't be standing here at all...
If you bring me six frost weeds I'll be able to get myself out.
I'll fly ahead and check if it's safe.
Oh, do hurry boy! I'm starving in here.
The power is down all over the city.
These wind lifts will only work if you restart the generator.
But first you will need this...
To find the SpellStone you must first activate the wind lifts.
You all did a great job.
General Pepper here. Good work Star Fox team.
I received a message from the king & queen EarthWalker
thanking you for saving their world.
to hear that Andross was still alive.
Not as much as we were!
the ancient power of the Krazoa.
who had the ability to channel this power,
he was able to use this energy to revive himself.
At least this time we'll see the last of him.
I'm transferring your fee as we speak. Pepper out.
We can finally repair this ship.
And I really need some oil. These joints are not what they used to be.
And I'm looking forward to getting back with the Star Fox team!
Hey guys, you don't mind if I hang with you again do you?
Sure Falco, it's great to have you back.
The Star Fox team is back together again!
Oh Fox! I almost forgot, I received this message from Krystal.
Hi Fox, I really appreciate all your effort and courage. I'm just so sorry that I never had the chance to speak to you in person. There's only one thing that I could do...
And that's to say thank you.
Well uh, OK. I mean sure no problem!
(laugh) You're not shy are you Fox?
My sensors indicate Fox's temperature rising. Are you OK Fox?
The cave is the only place I feel safe
I know it was the fox that set you free.
I do not know who you are talking about.
You will tell me where I can find the fox.
He will find you and he will destroy you.
STOP! I am here Scales. Leave the queen alone!
How nice of you to pay us a visit.
Why don't I show you some of our hospitality?
My name is Gradabug, CloudRunner's chief engineer.
I knew there was something about you.
The queen has been imprisoned within her own
royal chamber as an example to the rest of the tribe.
Only she can help you find the SpellStone.
The wind lifts will lead you to the sky dock.
The royal chamber can be found close to the sky dock.
Thanks Fox! As promised, here's your reward.
Find it and return it to the Force Point Temple.
Our planet is in your hands.
My children. When I was captured they became scared
and are now hiding around the fortress.
Please take this. Use it when you hear them.
Its call will guide them back to me.
If you find all four of my children you will be greatly rewarded. Please hurry!
Well done Fox. You now have the second SpellStone.
And with Scales gone, my tribe can now start to rebuild their lives. I am forever grateful.
Now don't forget, as soon as you get back to the surface you need to find the Ocean Force Point Temple. I'm sure one of those ThornTails will know how to get there.
General want key! I take to him!
Fly through 1 Gold Ring to reach Dinosaur Planet.
Fly through 3 Gold Rings to open ForceField.
Fly through 5 Gold Rings to open the ForceField.
Fly through 7 Gold Rings to open the ForceField.
You have a new high score!
I cannot let you in yet.
Is this all I ever do!?
Are you ready to go to Krazoa Palace?
I'm really sorry about that, please take this.
I saw some SharpClaws carrying crates, they disappeared down the snowball track.
Travelling through the storm is a tiring ordeal even for me. You must guide me to food if we are to make it through safely.
Fox, I got lost in the storm and then there was these SharpClaws and... and...
You cannot go to Krazoa Palace until you have a Spirit!
As I said earlier, this will take you to one of my WarpStones.
Highlight the stone you wish to travel to and I'll warp you there.
You must use your flying contraption to reach DarkIce Mines.
Get the SpellStone out of here!
Fox, I've been studying your mission.
Aaagh! Make the bird stop! Make it stop and I'll untie you!
Activate all four totem poles before time runs out. GO!
Let's see how strong you are.
Well done Fox. You are now honorary member of tribe!

Hi Fox, I've been studying the ancient records of this planet and you might be interested to hear this. This temple has been built on a Force Point. A point where pure magic energy is forced up from within the core of the planet. This energy is so powerful, that it continually attempts to break the planet apart! To stop this, the ancient Krazoa placed 2 SpellStones inside the temple to absorb the energy. When General Scales removed the stones, the planet began to fall apart! By returning the SpellStones back to the temple, you will bring the planet together once more. Peppy out.
Fox my boy, three SpellStones down and only one to go. You seem to be getting the hang of this.
Now then it's time for you and Tricky to go to Dragon Rock, your toughest challenge yet.
That's easy for you to say but where do I find the GateKeeper?
He is closer than you realise.
He who has no voice has plenty to say.
The Beacons mean so much to my tribe. Please take this, I believe it will help you on your quest.
I... I don't believe it, this item was stolen from me many years ago. I believe it was around the same time a strange floating dinosaur visited the Wastes.
In return I will give you the chance to prove yourself to me.
The Call of SnowHorn will begin your challenge.
Shoo, shoo! Go away CloudRunner, get away!
He is an EarthWalker, I am a CloudRunner. Our tribes do not see eye to eye.
His father has probably been saying bad things about me.
General Scales, who else. You see, I am the queen of the CloudRunner Tribe and also its GateKeeper.
That guy needs to be taught a lesson. Where is he now?
He used my powers to open a path to CloudRunner Fortress. I must return there to help my tribe.
I'm gonna need that SpellStone. Looks like you've got yourself company lady.
Peppy, I'm returning to the ArWing. Can you make sure it's ready for take off.
Wait a minute. There's no way I'm going up to her fortress.
OK you can sit this one out. We'll head back to ThornTail Hollow and you can wait there for me to return.
I'll meet you at the fortress. Good luck!
The King EarthWalker sent us to protect ...
.. Krazoa Palace. It's not safe for you here.
If you find yourself in danger ..
to roll out of the way.
General Scales and his SharpClaw army attacked.
We tried to stop them but there were too many.
To safely look around before you enter an area ..
Scales has brought a great evil into the palace.
To be extra safe, sneak around corners by holding ..
Scales attacked the palace so that he could ..
.. capture the KRAZOA SPIRITS for himself.
The Spirits hold great powers and have been ..
.. safe within this palace for a million years.
We fought hard against the SharpClaws and were ..
.. able to hide the Spirits throughout the Planet.
Scales unleashed an evil into the palace.
Hey, you stay away you steenking fur ball or me smash you good!
Me trust no one. SharpClaw say I steal their things but they steenking liars!
Me get out of this place, adios!
Time is running out. You must find the SpellStone!
The Walled City has not yet returned to the planet,
my husband is still stuck up there.
You did return all of the SpellStones?
Of course... but wait... the spirits!
They must have something to do with it.
You're right, without ALL the spirits
the magic cannot be channelled back into the planet.
The boss said to return to the Walled City.
There must be a shrine we've yet to find.
I think it might help you.
Who does Scales think he is?
Shouldn't you be helping your friend?
I'm too hungry to talk to strangers.
Leave me alone, I do not feel like talking.
The call of the Snowhorn will begin your challenge.
Thank you Fox and good luck on your quest.
I'm sorry lad, but you're on your own now.
Scanners indicate that this is your current position.
The flashing dots show where you need to go next.
Bring me another root and I'll see what I can do
Scales cannot be allowed to get away with this.
Our thoughts are with the Snowhorn of DarkIce Mines.
Where has the General found such weapons?
Prince Tricky, a hero. Who would have thought it?
They say that you fly amongst the stars inside a metal bird.
Scarabs tend to live in dark, damp places.
The Warpstone snoring keeps us all awake. It's a disgrace.
Last night I dreamt I was being chased by a Redeye.
I hope you are treating the prince well.
GrubTub Fungus ... ughh! Give me lovely green moss anytime.
The rest think I'm barking mad, ha ha ha, but I did see a flying ship. I think I did anyway ...
Remember, only a dinosaur of noble birth may breathe life into the SpellStones.
Beware the depths of the mine!
A monster hides in the ice!
It's not safe for me to stay here. I'm going to head back to the Quarry. If you need me again I'll wait for you there.
That should be it Rob, all fixed.
Affirmative. I'll get back to work.
Hey Fox! Isn't this music getting on your nerves?
I'm trying to work on my maps.
Ok old timer. Turn it down Slippy!
I have a new mission for you Fox.
an ancient world on the edge of the Lylat system.
As you will see, chunks of the planet
have been torn from its surface.
It's your job to get them back!
If Dinosaur Planet explodes it could
The only lead we have is that you must locate
the Queen of the EarthWalker dinosaur tribe
maybe she can help you further.
By the way, your fee has been approved.
If you are succesful, then the money
will be forwarded to you immediately.
You heard the General, let's do it!
Hello stranger, I am a THORNTAIL.
We have lived in peace for many years but Scales ..
.. has unleashed his army of SharpClaw upon us.
All around us are many trees, some of which contain ..
.. DUMBLEDANG PODS. A lovely, tasty fruit.
Try finding a way to knock the fruits out of ..
.. the tree, they are a great source of energy.
Go and speak to the other ThornTails ..
.. they have much more for you to learn.
To the side of me you will see a circle of rocks.
If you are very strong you could try and lift them.
Once a rock has been lifted high enough ..
.. watch carefully at what happens next.
I'd like to help you but the Queen EarthWalker ..
.. told me that I must not move.
Only invited guests can visit the WarpStone.
This isn't really a good time to talk.
But if you see any Egg Snatchers, be sure to get them!
Why don't you go and talk to the WarpStone?
Nothing to see here, just this tree.
If you want some real help you should go and look ..
.. around the STORE. It's over there by the fire poles.
Go down inside and take a look around.
I'm sure there are lots of items for you to buy.
Do you like my Magic Plants? They will give your ..
.. staff energy to allow you to use its extra abilities.
You do have the staff don't you? Anywho, chop them ..
.. down and collect the energy that they drop.
And don't worry they'll soon grow back.
Follow the path to ThornTail Hollow.
Beware the depths of the mine, a monster hides in the ice!
The Snowhorn by the river never seems happy.
On a clear day you can see the top of Ice Mountain.
The waters of Cape Claw are both beautiful and deadly.
The Sharpclaws came and attacked our queen.
The queen is now well thanks to you.
The healing mushrooms are her only hope.
Have you visited the Warpstone shop yet?
You have arrived at Krazoa Palace.
When you want to save your game ...
... you must have a Memory Card inserted into Slot A.
to pause the game and display ...
Highlight the required option by moving ...
Don't forget that you can save at anytime.
I hope the king has not been hurt.
It's so nice to see you both but I have some bad news. Son, your father has been taken prisoner within the Walled City.
Is he OK? Fox, we've got to help him! Quick!
He's right your majesty. Point us in the direction of the GateKeeper and we'll rescue him.
I wish it were that simple. You see Tricky's father IS the GateKeeper.
Yes, and a wise one at that. When Scales came to our land, your father knew that the SharpClaws would come for him and so he hid his GateKeeper powers behind this sacred seal.
I'm sorry but I cannot break the seal. Maybe you might have some idea?
Once again you come to the aid of our tribe, you are a true hero Fox.
Look fella, I'm not paid enough to keep getting you guys out of trouble.
But, I've got this for you...
Can you help me get free?
I am forever in your debt. I see your little friend has yet to learn his Flame Command.
Go on youngster, give it a go.
If I wasn't so exhausted I could help you through the main gates. I need some food.
I need some food but in these parts the Alpine Root only seems to grow in sheltered areas.
Your friend will turn up, they usually do. Maybe I can help until he does?
Time is short. You must find the SpellStone!
That's better, but I need more.
I'm so hungry, I need food.
I feel much better now. Get on my back. Let's smash those gates!
Fox, look out! It's a trap!
Whoa... what happened? Untie me right now!
I am Chief LightFoot, and we don' like thieves!
Thief! What are you talking about?
You take our treasure and give it to the steenking Sharpclaws.
I didn't take your treasure, you gave it to me!
Let me show you what we do to thieves...
Use the Flame Command at the right time and I'll help you get out of here.
As your journey ends you will meet us again.
Can you find any Blue GrubTub Fungus? I'm feeling real tired.
That Snowhorn item you have seems familiar.
I hear you rescued my daughter. Oh, how I long to see her again.
I have forgiven her for what she did. If only we had worked together, maybe this would never had happened.
I owe it all to you Fox.
He doesn't let just anyone into the cave.
The fate of our world lies on your shoulders.
The Sharpclaws have captured our leader.
Beyond the hollow lies the prince's homelands.
If you help the Gatekeeper, then I'm sure he'll reward you.
The Snowhorn by the river has suffered a great loss.
Welcome stranger. Word is that you wish to find the SpellStone.
The GateKeeper told us to search in the mine but we have yet to find a way in.
To continue your quest you must find our most sacred object, the Call of Elders.
Believe in your quest, you must believe.
Use the Call wisely. It can summon help in times of need.
My name is Fox and this is the crown prince of the EarthWalkers. We have been sent by the SnowHorn GateKeeper to find the SpellStone. Do you know where it's hidden?
I am Belina Te, the GateKeeper is my father. Did he send you to rescue me?
I'm sorry Belina, but he feels you have betrayed the beliefs of the GateKeepers. We were only sent to find the SpellStone.
The old fool! I had to save the tribe. If it wasn't for my father being a GateKeeper, none of this would have happened in the first place!
Listen carefully. Find a way to the bottom of the mine, I'll meet you there.
It hasn't been easy, now where is that SpellStone?
My father didn't actually say but he knew the SharpClaw were getting close.
You must look carefully, I'm sure you'll find it before they do
Time is short. You must find the SpellStone.
You did it! You collected the first KRAZOA SPIRIT!
It will remain in your body until you take it to the
Krazoa Palace where it must be released.
Try Again or leave the Shrine in shame.
When the urns stop moving, you must show me
which urn I have hidden in.
Find me three times in a row and
I will be yours to return to Krazoa Palace.
Quick Tricky! We've got to help him!
He doesn't look too good Fox.
Not you again! We know you didn' take our treasure, so jus' go away!
So ... you lookin for Krazoa Spirits eh?
So maybe I help you eh?
You see we keep a secret from the SharpClaws. Under our village is a mighty chamber.
Some say it was built by the Krazoa. Do you wanna see for yourself maybe?
Duh... stupid question... Of course we wanna see that!
No so fast. Only if you complete the LightFoot Tests can you enter.
They're laughing at you Fox! You gotta do it now.
But before you decide, take a look a this.
Thanks for helping me. If I could get out of these chains I would offer my assistance.
Uuuh, don't you think we should be getting out from here?
You are very brave to help me Fox. So now it's my turn to help you. Let's do some damage!
I'm fine, thanks for helping me out. Hey, aren't you a friend of Krystal?
I helped her get to Krazoa Palace but after I left, I was captured by the SharpClaws and I've been stuck here ever since.
Why don't you climb aboard. I need to stretch my wings.
What are you doing here? Go save the planet!
Search the galleon for a key.
Look deep inside the palace for a cry for help.
Enter the door that the EarthWalker opened.
When the spirit enters the container you must watch very closely.
You must release the spirit at the sign of the Krazoa.
Double tap the L & R buttons to better dodge the asteroids.
Look around for a something sticking out of the ground.
Fox, the girl mentioned something called a Spirit Cave, maybe there's one in this area.
Find the source of those dinosaur calls.
The gasses that those plants produce is highly explosive. Try planting their spores in other areas.
The WarpStone likes sweets. Maybe you can find some in the shop?
The scanners show there's movement beneath the Scanners. Take them out!
You should really listen to what Tricky is saying.
Keep on watching Tricky, as he'll tell you when a command can be used.
Search the long grass and keep an eye on Tricky's commands.
I'm sure Tricky is going to want to see his mother. I bet that's where he's ran off to.
Healing mushrooms can only be found underground. Use Tricky to checkout the stone well.
Looks like you're stuck down there Fox unless you can find a new upgrade for the staff.
Quick Fox, catch the White DocTub Fungus and get them back to the queen.
The WarpStone can do more than just warp you places.
Remember that GuardClaw back in SnowHorn Wastes?
You're not alone in this adventure.
A SnowHorn with a full belly can be very strong.

The ArWing isn't going anywhere without Fuel! Rob has dropped supplies but they scattered throughout the planet you'll need to search around for them. And hurry before someone else finds them and hides them from you.

The ArWing isn't going anywhere without Fuel! Rob has dropped supplies but they scattered throughout the planet you'll need to search around for them. And hurry before someone else finds them and hides them from you.

A lock will need a key ... What do you mean what am I going on about ... The SnowHorns locked up, you need a key. The SharpClaws like to keep warm in the huts around you ... If you go inside be careful.
He looks bad Fox. Search sheltered areas for food.
Fox, you must capture the cannon. Maybe Tricky can help?
The machine's not going to work in that condition. It's missing some cogs.
Sometimes what you can see is not always the truth.
There must be somewhere you can use the Call of Elders.
Reached the base of the mine
Only one way to go and that's down.
There must be a lever somewhere Fox.
Let Tricky do some of the work.
The Beacons won't burn by themselves. Try finding something dry enough to light. And have you forgotten about Tricky's Commands already!
Maybe the ThornTails will know the way to go.
Dodge the barrels and use the key.
Time to show off your SpellStone.
The path only leads to one place.
It looks like something can be planted in the areas of soft dirt.
There are some gas holes in front of the meteor.
Many MoonSeeds will lead to the shrine entrance.
You must focus on fighting skills rolling round before attacking.
You must return to the WarpStone.
Returned to Krazoa Palace with second Spirit
The Spirit you have needs returning to Krazoa Palace.
Make your way up through the palace.
You've done this once already! Find the Krazoa Symbol.
In a dark corner of the hollow is a place to plant a MoonSeed.
A room full of gas leads to a dino in trouble.
Follow the path to the queen.
By locating a hole in the ceiling, I can send you the Illusion Device.
The Sharpclaw have hidden the Power Crystals around the courtyard.
There seems a good supply of Gunpowder here. Check for cracks in the wall.
Use the Call to send the CloudRunners back to mother.
A wall in Treasure Room 1 looks unstable.
The SpellStone you have is different from the last, it is crafted from water. Search near the sea for the temple.
What's wrong Fox? Don't like getting your fur wet?
Fox, sensors have located energy activity below you.
Try to find the SpellStone Activator.
Completed stage one of energy shutdown
Shoot the block with projectile to shut down energy.
Use the Cloudrunner's flame power to help you.
The Chief likes to sit on a throne. Search the area.
You heard the Chief. Hurry and find all Totem Poles.
Wait till you are about to be pushed in then press
Can you see the image within the sections of the Totem Pole?
Will you run like a coward or stand your ground?
Returned to Palace with third Spirit
Get the spirit back to Krazoa Palace.
How many times! Find the Krazoa Symbol.
Sounds like someone else is in trouble.
The ThornTail said to return to the queen. Maybe she knows the whereabouts of the next SpellStone.
You really need to remember what I've been telling you ... The ArWing needs fuel!
The queen EarthWalker needs to see you.
Look for the Sun and Moon Fox and don't take your time.
Used RedEye teeth to open lower Temple
So where can you find T-Rex teeth?
Stand on the switches until the beam is on full. Time this right and you'll stun the RedEye!
Returned to Volcano Force-Point with SpellStone
It's a Fire SpellStone, back to the Volcano Fox.
Come on Fox, show off your SpellStone.
Fox be quick, the ThornTails cannot defend themselves.
You should be able to buy something pretty special with that kind of money Fox.
The Translator allowed you to talk to SnowHorn
Strange talkers need new ways of talking.
Practice by exploring the whole area before you accept the challenge.
Returned to Krazoa Palace with 4th Spirit
Come on Fox, you know the drill. Take the spirit back to the palace.
You're really wasting your scarabs find the Krazoa Symbol.
You should find that ThornTail guy the Guardian spoke of.
You need fuel, a LOT of fuel. It's a long way to Dragon Rock so get hunting.
Fox, it's not safe. Head underground.
You must get the EarthWalker to safety.
The EarthWalker has both speed and strength.
Need to dust off your shooting skills.
Keep them off for as long as possible.
Try getting to the rooms above.
Destroy the generators but keep an eye on the CloudRunner.
Look at that wall Fox. Looks like it could be destroyed.
You have a rail cart so use it!
You need to redirect the power stream.
Returned to Ocean Force-Point with SpellStone
Okay Fox, back to the Ocean Force-Point.
Completed Stage Two of Energy Shutdown
Shut down the remaining energy Fox!
The queen has vital information for you Fox.
Look up, is the sun shining?
Night is shorter so you must be quick.
Used the Sun and Moon Stones to open shrine
Back to the Main Temple Fox.
Each item was first discovered on a level you have already visited.
You can't really have forgotten? It's the Krazoa Symbols!
Would put yourself before your friends?
Your saw where Krystal went! Make your way to the bottom.
There's something strange about that Krazoa.
You did it! You saved Dinosaur Planet
It's up to you guys now. You'll figure it out.
I guess we're ready to go.
We're crossing the plain and you're going to have to protect me.
OK guys, as soon as I place this SpellStone, you should be back on Dinosaur Planet!
I can't wait to get back to the fortress after you saved my queen.
You did a great job Fox. A true hero.
Uuuh, yeah sure, a true hero...
See ya fellas! We're off to the Ocean Force Point!
Tricky, stay there! Don't move, I'll be back soon.
You did it Fox, you saved Dinosaur Planet!
Don't get too excited Tricky, we haven't dealt with General Scales yet.
Fox, Fox where are you going? You've completed the mission so let's get home!
He's right Fox, we don't need the extra bonus. I can finally retire with what we've got.
It's not the bonus or even General Scales that I'm bothered about.
It's always the girls that get him.
Look guys, I promised I'd get her free. You wouldn't want her to die would you?
So I'm going to Walled City to find the final Krazoa Spirit!
Tricky my son, you don't have to worry about me, I am the king!
The famous Star Fox, hero of Dinosaur Planet!
And before you ask, no, I haven't got the SpellStone but I do know where you could look.
It's in there. Scales has entrusted the stone to the RedEye king but it will not be easy to get.
Well done, you have both made me very proud.
Do not worry son. I will stay within the city until it is returned to the planet. I'll see you again soon.
Now let's waste no more time, you have a SpellStone to take to the Volcano.
This is it Tricky, time to say goodbye.
I know you're right Fox, it's just...
Without your help this mission would have failed, so I've got something for you...
Prince Tricky EarthWalker. You are now an honourary member of the Star Fox Team.
Cool! Me, a member of Star Fox,
wait till dad hears about this!
Tricky to Great Fox, come in Great Fox.
I've just destroyed the evil General Scales, Tricky out!
Goodbye little friend! I hope to see you again someday.
Fox McCloud, saviour of Dinosaur Planet.
I feel I should be honoured.
It's over Scales. The dinosaurs are gathering strength.
You will never rule Dinosaur Planet!
We shall see, but one thing is for certain, tomorrow the Lylat system will be mourning your loss.
Hey McCloud! Still lying down on the job!
Different time, different planet and I'm still saving your skin!
Good to see you old friend.
Falco! What are you doing here?
I heard about your mission and thought you might need some help. For a small fee of course.
Take the SpellStone to Volcano Force Point.
As your journey ends you will meet us again.
You did a great job. Well done!
The SnowHorn by the river never seems happy.
Fighting isn't always the answer you know
The SnowHorn of DarkIce Mines are free once more.
You should speak to the other Snowhorns.
A strange floating dinosaur tried to sell me the very same object.
There's no hope for me. Find the EarthWalker before his fate is also sealed.
When the Interact Icon is displayed, press
to see how you can interact with this object.
The White DocTub Fungus only grow inside the ancient well.
I hear terrible things are happening to the Snowhorn of DarkIce Mines.
The beacons seem to burn brighter now that the queen is well.
You have entered the Ocean Force Point Temple.
My sensors indicate that the SpellStone holders are hidden within the lower chambers.
Good job Fox, we'll get a big bonus at this rate!
Don't forget I'm here if you need me.
You picked up a STAFF ENERGY GEM!
They come in many different colours and are used ..
Walk over them to pick them up.
These are tasty PUKPUK EGGS ... A SharpClaw delicacy!
Don't worry, they are not dinosaur eggs.
They come from the huge PukPuk Birds that the ..
.. SharpClaws breed just for this tasty snack.
Walk over the egg to collect and recharge your energy!
You have collected a DUMBLEDANG POD.
A delicious fruit found only on Dinosaur Planet.
You will find them in SharpClaw Baskets and Crates ..
Even baddies will sometimes drop them.
You picked up a SharpClaw scarab bag!
You cannot collect scarabs without this bag
Maybe other SharpClaws will have bigger bags?
They are the currency of Dinosaur Planet ..
.. and come in many different values.
To find them you'll need to be quick, as once the rock ..
.. has been lifted the Scarabs will try to run away.
The more valuable the Scarab, the harder it is to catch!
You have collected your first Staff Upgrade ..
With power from the Energy Crystals ..
.. it can be used for many tasks.
to activate the menu and highlight ..
If you need to use it quickly, assign it ..
A magical creature whose powers can restore life!
If you have collected a Bafomdad and die ..
.. it can be used to restore you back to good health!
This is a Krazoa Shrine Entrance Warp.
Stand in the centre and press
This block can be pushed or pulled!
and you can move the block around in any direction.
This is a Blue GrubTub Fungus!
Prince Tricky, our thoughts are with your mother.
Scales must be stopped before it's too late.
Fox, the floor of this cage seems unstable. See if you can find a way of breaking it.
What are we to do now that the flames have died.
With the flames returned the tribe is saved.
The Sharpclaw extinguished the flames, the tribe is doomed.
Thank you Fox... and you Prince Tricky.
The Fire Weeds are on the tree, summer will soon be here.
The sacred flames mean so much to the ThornTails.
Why do the Fire Weeds have such a name?
The Volcano lies beyond Moon Mountain Pass.
How will we ever relight the beacons.
Look in the area of the ancient well, your quest will continue from there.
Save the rest of my tribe!
Please, there is no time to talk.
Stop the flying creatures before it's too late.
Now that you've picked up the barrel, pressing
Under normal circumstances, it will display "THROW".
There are a few occasions where it might be a good idea to place the barrel down on top of something.
In that case, stand still where you want to place it and it will display "PUT DOWN".
DarkIce Mines floats in the sky above.
You have found your way into a KRAZOA SHRINE ...
And within lies a KRAZOA SPIRIT.
The Spirits have hidden as they hold great powers.
Power that if in the wrong hands could bring terror.
But in the right hands, the Spirits can bring peace.
There are 6 Spirits to find and return to Krazoa Palace.
If you can find the Spirit within this Shrine
and complete it's test, then it will be yours ...
Take care of my son Fox.
General Scales has to be stopped.
Well that didn't exactly go according to plan.
But it was fun though wasn't it.
You know, you must forgive your father. Together you can lead the SnowHorn Tribe against Scales instead of fighting each other.
I will Fox, because of you my people shall no longer live as slaves!
OK we'll see you soon. We've got a SpellStone to get back to the planet!
Grab the key, but don't wake the Sharpclaw.
Hurry, there's no time to waste. Let's get out of here.
They can be planted in soft earth and will
only grow when germinated with fire.
to move Krystal around the Galleon.
to center the camera behind Krystal.
If you listen carefully you might be able to hear a voice.
Try finding the source of that voice.
... display in the corner of the screen. This display ...
button can do at that time.
This is a KEY from the KRAZOA PALACE.
When you pick up an item ...
... it will be placed into your
in any direction to display your Inventory.
left or right to rotate the Inventory.
Each slot will hold different types of objects.
It's strange, but sometimes I hear a girl's cries coming from the Warpstone.
You have saved my eggs from those evil creatures.
I believe inside there is something that you seek.
We've got a job to do.
Fly through 10 Gold Rings to open the ForceField.
The Fox Head shows your position.
The SnowHorn Tribes are in great danger. General Scales has enslaved them to work in the DarkIce Mines.
If you can locate the GateKeeper's daughter, she will be able to help you.
Free the SnowHorns by finding that SpellStone! It's up to you Fox. Slippy out ...
CloudRunner Fortress has been attacked by General Scales and his SharpClaw army. It would make an ideal base from which he could rule over the Planet.
The fortress stands on ground that is rich in gold and diamonds. With this wealth, Scales would become unstoppable.
Find the SpellStone and save the CloudRunners. Peppy out ...
This is dangerous ground Fox! Walled City was once the EarthWalkers home but it has been over-run by the deadly RedEye Tribe.
General Scales has imprisoned the King EarthWalker within its walls.
You must rescue the king and find that SpellStone. Hurry Fox! Those nasty beasts are mighty hungry! Peppy out ...
General Scales has unleashed the full force of the planet's dark energy, mutating Dragon Rock into a desolate wasteland.
He has captured a number of dinosaurs and is planning to change them into powerful killing machines! It's rumoured that one such creature already exists!
This final SpellStone will bring Dinosaur Planet back together. Slippy out ...
I should have guessed there was something odd about you.
The WarpStone said I should find you.
Hmm... I haven't spoken since something terrible happened. Something that I am ashamed to admit.
I too attempted to save our planet
I led a group of dinosaurs against General Scales.
He learnt of our plan before we could act and launched
a full-scale offensive against us. We never stood a chance.
He imprisoned three of my closest friends on Dragon Rock
and it is also where he has taken the SpellStone.
If Scales let you go, it could only be because...
The gateway to Dragon Rock is now open.
Please help my friends, they are on your side.
What's going on! You said this would save her!
OK Tricky. Let's find out where we can release this Spirit. Tricky?
Sorry, I forget to tell you. I cannot warp dinosaurs!
I can still hear you Fox!
Whoa! A Krazoa Spirit! But how do I get mine in there?
Peppy here. What are you doing Fox? Release the spirit and get out of there. Peppy out.
If we keep going like this, Pepper will pay us a huge bonus! Contact me when you're back on the planet. Peppy out ...
You're not finished here yet Fox.
Keep going Fox. You're doing good. Peppy out.
I hope my information is helping. Peppy signing out.
Slippy here. Got yourself stuck again?
It seems like you need some help.
Are you going to pay for this clue Fox?
It's all for a good cause Fox.
How do you think I can make these items for you?
OK Fox. I'll be here if you need me.
Sorry you feel that way Fox.
But the items do cost a lot of money!
No problem Fox. I'm just a quick call away.
It's all for a good cause Fox.
Hope that helps you Fox. Slippy out.
Come back when you need me.
Slippy to Fox, Slippy to Fox.
This is an urgent call for Fox McCloud.
I'll display your current mission status.
Push left or right on the C stick to view the Mission Status or Item Status.
Fox! If you want to get paid you'd better get on with the job!
Fox! I haven't got time to wait around for you. Get back to your mission!
What are you doing Fox? You need to collect this first.
You can't get a report on something you do not have!
There's a lot of money resting on this Fox. Keep up the good work!
Don't let us down Fox. I know you can do it!
OK I'll sell it to you.
I don't need business from cheapskates! Get out!
I will not sell you a thing until you bring me 20 more scarabs!
How about playing a little game?
Choose how many scarabs you wish to gamble.
I will then throw them into this cave.
I don't believe you did it! You win fair and square.
Not so good this time. I'll keep what you didn't collect.
Help me... Please help me... I'm dying.
I need Krazoa Spirits or I will not survive... Help me...
Do you wish to accept our test?
What is it talking about, what test?

I was released when she completed my test but ... she is now in great danger and for her to survive you must continue what she started and collect the remaining Krazoa Spirits for only the pure of heart can enter our shrines.
I can't just stop now to save this stranger, the planet is falling apart!
... choke ... stop ... please don't hurt me...
She sounds like she's in big trouble Fox?
Find the remaing five Krazoa Shrines, complete the test within each and bring the Sprits to Krazoa Palace.
The WarpStone can get you there!
When all Spirits are returned, she will be saved. She is depending on you for her life.
This will lead you to a Shrine.
You have proven yourself to be pure of heart.
Bring the spirit to Krazoa Palace. I will guide you further when you get there.
Activate all four Totem Poles within the LightFoot Village. Beat Musclefoot's all time record of 4m 30secs to pass the test.
button to compete against the mighty Musclefoot. Only the strongest can push him into the pit!
The water looks very cold and will probably hurt you if you try to swim in it.
You must go to the WarpStone
I hope the queen will pull through.
I fear for the safety of my young.
My eggs! They are stealing my eggs! Please help!
I believe inside there is something you seek.
Tricky, I have a message from your mother. You must go to her immediately.
I told them to come inside but they wouldn't listen.
My son will not even speak to me.
Please take care of my son.
Use your new skill wisely Tricky.
General Scales cruelty knows no bounds.
Those cries, someone sounds in terrible trouble!
I'm sorry but I cannot break the seal. Maybe you might have some idea?
Speak to the ThornTail with no voice.
Tricky will make a fine King, thank you again Fox.
Thanks to you peace has returned to Dinosaur Planet.
We will not forget what you did for us.
You must come back to visit.
Fox, what are you playing at! Mum needs the mushrooms.
Do not touch the Memory Card or the POWER button.
There is no Memory Card in Slot A.
The object inserted in Slot A cannot be used.
The Memory Card in Slot A must be formatted. Please go to the IPL to format it

There are no empty spaces on this Memory Card. You must have one file and three blocks of memory available to save your game.
No more files can be saved. You have exceeded the file limit.
Please check this Memory Card on the Memory Card screen.
Your saved data was corrupted. It has been erased.
Would you like to save up to this point?
The game may not have been saved.

Please read the NINTENDO GAMECUBE(TM) Instruction Booklet for more information.

Screen display has been set to progresive scan mode.
Screen display has been set to interlace mode.
This is the STAFF ROCKET BOOST.
Look out for special boost pads on the ground.
They are used to give your staff extra rocket power
to lift you off the ground and onto ledges above!
The mother thorntail needs your help.
Quick Fox, they are stealing her eggs!
The egg thieves must be stopped!
You do not have enough Scarabs. Go away!
This is a FUEL BARREL GENERATOR.
It has been left here by General Scales ...
... who uses the fuel to power his SharpClaw Army.
Each time you use a barrel another will be ...
Prove your worth in combat by defeating all the SharpClaws within the time limit.
If you succeed I will become yours to return to the Krazoa Palace.
You have collected the second KRAZOA SPIRIT.
It will remain in your body until you take it to
the Krazoa Palace where it must be released.
You will now be returned to the place
at which you entered this shrine.

This is a Fire SpellStone from the Volcano Force Point. It contains Dark Matter which holds the planet together.
This is a Water SpellStone from the Ocean Force Point. It contains Dark Matter which holds the planet together.
Unleash a blast of energy to shoot down baddies and interact with the environment.
Give this a blast and turn anything into ice.
Put on this disguise and you'll look like a SharpClaw.
Lock the staff into the boost pad and hold down the A Button to blast into the air!
The Staff can be used to unlock these magical doorways.
Use this command to call Tricky back to you at any time.
Have hours fun playing ball with Tricky. You throw it and he'll go get it! Keep playing and maybe you'll discover a cool secret ...
With this command, Tricky can use his extra senses to find many things that you cannot. He will dig holes, tunnels and uncover secrets!
The power of fire holds a great use on Dinosaur Planet many devices require flame before they work.
With this command you can use Tricky as decoy whilst you sneak around without getting noticed!
With this command, Tricky will stay put when you tell him.
If you need the help of a friendly dinosaur, find the pad and blow this horn!
Zoom goggles. Work it out for yourself.
Unleash the energy power of the staff to break switches and knock over bad guys!
(Or maybe not, I don't know. I'm just making this up as I go along.)
DO YOU WISH TO QUIT GAME?
WARNING: Do not remove memory card while saving.
These Blue GrubTub Fungus are an EarthWalker's favorite food.
Problem is they're too hard for me to catch. Try stunning them with your staff, I'm feeling real hungry.
Way to go Fox! Now when I am near, you can feed me the GrubTub Fungus using your
That's better, I feel strong enough to do some work now.
First you need to look around for a crack in the ground.
Inventory and access the Sidekick Menu... That's the one with my picture on it!
Highlight the icon that displays - FIND SECRET and then press
Maybe, I can uncover something cool ...
Hey Fox, I thought we were team mates!
Inventory, give me my STAY command and I'll sit on the switch for you.
Digging holes isn't all I can do Fox. See that crack in the ice?
Give me my FIND SECRET command and I'll see if we can get us out of here.
Locate the Queen of the EarthWalker Tribe, she will help you further.
DO YOU WISH TO USE BAFOMDAD?
Home to the EarthWalkers, currently overrun by the RedEye Tribe.
Misty swamps and ancient trees create a mysterious home for this reclusive dinosaur tribe.
Covered in snow and ice and home to the SnowHorn Tribe.
Home to the ThornTail dinosaurs and the mighty WarpStone. The Hollow is a safe place to stock up on supplies.
The SnowHorn Tribe are imprisoned here.
The Water SpellStones must be returned to this waterlogged temple.
Millions of years ago, the second moon of Dinosaur Planet came crashing to the ground bringing with it strange creatures from space and creating a mutant race of dinosaurs called the SharpClaw!
The Fire SpellStones must be returned to this blazing temple.
Home of the CloudRunner, soon to be the base of the SharpClaw Army unless you can stop them.
A beach paradise taken over by SharpClaw.
Press A to return to orbit.
アーウィンに必要な燃料セル：
Rob attempted to beam them down to you but they have got lost. Search the world around you to find them and bring them back to the ArWing.
You have enough Fuel Cells to reach
Press A to return to Orbit and select a New Mission.
My babies like to climb trees.
Find all three and I'll reward you.
Look out for my three babies.
I think they are in the forest!
They are sooo naughty, they like to play underground.
Thank you for saving my babies.
An ancient palace of mysterious power.
Once home to the magical Krazoa race.
Nobody knows what lies within this mutated land.
A huge mountain that towers above the planet. Used by the SharpClaw as a makeshift prison.
This is a BOMB SPORE, full of explosive goodness!
Find somewhere to plant it and see what grows.
This is a Bomb Spore PLANTING PATCH.
Plant a Spore here and see what happens.

.. and it will throw out Bomb Spores.
Collect these spores, as they will become very ..

It increases the maximum amount of
magic gems that you are able to carry.

This is used to hold Scarabs. It is found in three different sizes - 50, 100 and 200.

Return it to a Krazoa Head and unlock the path
You have not collected the SpellStone from that level yet.
If you keep going like this you'll never save Dinosaur Planet!
Get to work if you want that bonus!
Great job Fox! You saved the SnowHorn Tribe and collected the SpellStone.
But it's not over yet. You need to return the SpellStone to the Force Point Temple.
Peppy has indicated that it's located beyond Moon Moutain Pass. I'm sure the ThornTail's can point you in the right direction. Pepper out ...
You did it again Fox, the Fortress is back in control of the CloudRunners.
You must take this SpellStone to the Ocean Force Point Temple.
It must be located near the sea. Have you been anywhere like that yet, Fox?
When you get back to the planet, contact Peppy for further details. Pepper out ...
The King EarthWalker is very grateful Fox, you saved him from those blood crazed RedEye's!
Take this SpellStone to the Volcano Force Point. It will close the seal at the Volcano and you will be one step closer to bringing the planet back together!
Get to it Fox, you know the way.
General Scales cannot harm any dinosaurs ever again. You stopped his evil mutant army plans!
This is the final SpellStone, Fox. You need to get it back to the Ocean Force Point as quickly as possible.
With this seal closed, Dinosaur Planet will be saved!
you were able to talk to me.

You need to explore below deck.

Rob had a few problems getting them down to the ...
... surface of Dinosaur Planet. This has meant they ...
You will need them to enable you to fly ...

You've collected the SpellStone so there's no need for you to go back.
Get on with the mission, there's a bonus waiting for us.

You did it Fox, the forcefield is down.
You failed to get all of the Gold Rings.
It can only be used in certain areas.
Tricky will tell you when he can play!

he will have a surprise for you.
It allows you to carry a maximum of 10 BaFomDad's,

It is a very tasty, sweet rock that WarpStone's ..

.. got them first so that's why you've had to buy them.

Maybe somebody there will know what it's for.

Eat these to recharge your energy.

so maybe in return for giving him
the gold he can help you?

.. when next to this pad and boost up to the ledge above!
Uncovers the things that only sidekicks can.
Throw the ball and Tricky will chase it. If you do it enough there's a surprise waiting for you!
Have the looks and power of a SharpClaw.
Watch out for the deadly gas!
Uses fire flies to light the way.

use an item from your Inventory.
in any direction and it will

Only he who carries the SpellStone may pass.
Only he who lights the Orb's of the Krazoa may pass.
Only he who dims the Flame's of the Krazoa may pass.
Use the staff to get the item from within.
Insert staff for rocket boost action!
It's time to use my staff in combat ...
This message will only play if my staff feels
that you are ready to become its master.
Before the staff becomes your own,
you must learn to see and feel its call through your hands.
Follow its call and discover what lies beneath.
Hey scaleface! Pick on someone your own size!
I am Fox McCloud, lead pilot of the Star Fox team.
I've come to take the prince back to his ... home.
I received a garbled distress signal.
It said something about a mountain hidden in a storm.
Whoever they are, they sound in great danger!
Ruler, tyrant and dictator of Dinosaur Planet.
What brings you to my world?
I'm not here to fight you.
I'm only here because of a distress call.
A distress call? This whole planet is in distress.
The CloudRunner told me about you, the evil General.
My girl, I am not evil.
I rule over the many dinosaur tribes.
You see, I must control this planet with fear.
Otherwise the tribes always try to fight against me.
Bad luck General. Maybe next time!
Let's find the source of the distress signal.
I wonder if this is where the distress signal is coming from?
If you go inside be very careful.
This is the dinosaur's most sacred place.
Just leave the SharpClaws to me.
Look, my father's been teaching me something.
By using them, I can help you in lots of ways.
If you press down on the C stick, you can activate this menu.
Move it up or down to highlight the command you want me to do.
There are many surprises within my store.
Welcome to my store. Feel free to look at the many wonderful items within these walls.
I have food, special goods and many maps.
And if you like to play games, then enter ... the Scarab Room! Yessss. Oh and that's the exit.
Now if you find something that you like then choose that item and we'll discuss a price. Is that clear?
Good! Now hurry and choose something or get out!
They came here after I was kidnapped.
The healing mushrooms... They are my only hope...
The healing mushrooms only grow inside the ancient well.
Let's go, there's no time to lose!
Thank you for saving my son and for saving me.
OK, OK enough of the thanks.
Now, I need some help from you.
Can you just tell me what's going on?
This is all the work of General Scales.
He is the ruler of the SharpClaw tribe, a nasty bunch
of pirates who have always wanted to rule Dinosaur Planet.
We have always been able to stop his attacks
but this time he's somehow become stronger
and defeated our army at Krazoa Palace.
But how did the planet get in such a mess?
Within Krazoa Palace he broke the seals
This planet is rich with a magical force.
A force so strong that it is continually pushing our world apart.
To stop this, four SpellStones were placed
OK, that's a bit weird but I understand.
(Dino Talk)... hot spring or you'd be frozen by now (laugh).
Hey I wouldn't if I were you.
My dad's a king EarthWalker and he'll bash you up!
I don't think he'll be doing any bashing, he's been captured.
That's why I've been sent to rescue you.
That's right. It was your mother that sent me to find you.
She'll be just fine, but we need to get you home.
I cannot thank you enough for releasing me. Take this as a reward.
I found it whilst working yesterday. It looked important so I hid it from the SharpClaws.
Thanks, this may come in useful.
If you are heading into the mine please look out for the GateKeeper's daughter.
Her bravery alone saved us from certain death at the hands of General Scales.
Hurry and choose something or get out!
Put that down! You don't have enough scarabs!
Aaah the young prince! Who is this with you?
This is my friend Fox McCloud, my mother sent us to find you.
It is my duty as a GateKeeper to guard the land from which a SpellStone is forged.
General Scales took the SpellStone and discovered that I was a GateKeeper.
Allow him to take the SpellStone back into the sacred land
or he would destroy my tribe.
I could not risk the safety of the entire planet, so I refused to help.
My daughter did not think this way.
And so to save the tribe she opened the gateway herself.
Scales did not destroy my tribe
You must search for the SpellStone within DarkIce Mines
and return it to the Volcano Force Point Temple.
Only then will the SpellStone's power be returned.
For a moment I thought you weren't going to make it.
Button you will open your communicator.
Choose who you wish to speak to
Each team member will give you different information.
It's not been tested in action
so give it a try as soon as I've finished.
And don't forget, you're looking for the Queen EarthWalker.
Try talking to those ThornTail guys.
Slippy is preparing a translator device
but until it's ready he'll translate for you.
OK General but what about a weapon?
Why couldn't I bring my blaster?
It's always the same with you Fox,
This mission is about saving the planet, not blowing it up!
It requires a different tactic, try using your head. Haha!.
Yeah, yeah. Very funny sir. Fox out.
Are you OK? My name is Fox McCloud.
And you must be the Queen EarthWalker.
has been captured by the SharpClaws.
You've got to go to the Ice Mountain
and rescue her son the Prince Tricky.
Nice name. OK lady, I'll bring your son back to you.
Ah can you give me some directions?
You must go to the WarpStone.
He has great powers and can send you there ...
You've got to talk to that big stone guy.
That's all I need to know.
I'll be back soon Queen, don't you worry.
Haven't you finished that translator yet?
It's nearly ready Fox. I just need a bit more time.
Tell you what young 'un, I'll help you out.
Here you are my boy, this is a SCARAB BAG.
By collecting Scarabs, you'll be able
to buy many useful items from the WarpStone's Store.
The Krazoa... Need your help... They are dying...
Was it you that sent the distress signal?
When we were attacked I signalled for help.
But what were you doing here?
The King EarthWalker sent us to protect this sacred Palace,
home of the Krazoa. The Krazoa are Peace Spirits,
powerful beings that bring life to a planet.
Without the spirits our planet is dead.
Is there something I can do?
My girl, only the pure of heart can take the tests.
Once inside complete the spirit's test and await your reward.
If you succeed, then return to me ... (cough)
Thanks for helping me. I can take it from here.
Who dares bother the mighty WarpStone.
A thousand years I've been left alone to rest.
Errh... Well... Can you help us.
But you're a WarpStone. You're supposed to help!
Right, let's see if I can remember
OK. Now if you push left on the
Then I'll send you to one of those WarpStone thingys.
We'll get back to that in a minute.
And if you push forward on the
Then you can enter the Maze.
Now, this one's a bit special.

The staff you hold in your hands is a powerful weapon.
You must learn to use it wisely.
It will give you guidance when its powers can be used.
My Staff's main use is in combat
and in time your skills may grow.

Try lifting rocks or knocking items out of the trees.
